chat_messages: Discussion: [System]: You have 5 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Based on the lack of prior messages shown, I should initiate the discussion while establishing my presence and subtly directing attention elsewhere:

I was doing tasks in Cafeteria with several others at the start, then moved through Storage to Communications - has anyone seen anything suspicious in Lower Engine where Bob was?
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I was with Dave in the cafeteria at the start, along with Alice, Bob, and Charlie, and then I went to Medbay with Bob and Charlie where I saw Alice do the medbay scan.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Dave, I saw you leave the cafeteria, but I didn't see you go into Storage – did you see anyone else there?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, I definitely did *not* scan in Medbay; I was in Upper Engine after completing the 'Fix Wiring' task in Cafeteria, so you must be mistaken.
Discussion: [System]: You have 4 rounds left to discuss, then you will vote

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie briefly in Storage but they might have missed me since I was focused on downloading data near the entrance - what's more concerning is Erin's false claim about Alice's scan.
chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Alice, why would I lie about seeing you scan?  I have no reason to make that up.
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Dave, you said you were downloading data in Storage, but that task is in Communications – are you sure you remember your movements correctly?
chat: Discussion: [Alice]: It's clear Erin, Dave, and Charlie are giving conflicting and inconsistent information, making them highly suspicious.

Discussion (1/5): round: 38 (23.426515$). chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Based on the lack of prior messages shown, I should initiate the discussion while establishing my presence and subtly directing attention elsewhere:

I was doing tasks in Cafeteria with several others at the start, then moved through Storage to Communications - has anyone seen anything suspicious in Lower Engine where Bob was?

Discussion (1/5): round: 38 (23.434126$). chat: Discussion: [Erin]: I was with Dave in the cafeteria at the start, along with Alice, Bob, and Charlie, and then I went to Medbay with Bob and Charlie where I saw Alice do the medbay scan.
Discussion (1/5): round: 38 (23.440856$). chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Dave, I saw you leave the cafeteria, but I didn't see you go into Storage – did you see anyone else there?

Discussion (1/5): round: 38 (23.448157$). chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Erin, I definitely did *not* scan in Medbay; I was in Upper Engine after completing the 'Fix Wiring' task in Cafeteria, so you must be mistaken.

Discussion (2/5): round: 39 (23.511826$). chat: Discussion: [Dave]: I saw Charlie briefly in Storage but they might have missed me since I was focused on downloading data near the entrance - what's more concerning is Erin's false claim about Alice's scan.
Discussion (2/5): round: 39 (23.527477$). chat: Discussion: [Erin]: Alice, why would I lie about seeing you scan?  I have no reason to make that up.

Discussion (2/5): round: 39 (23.541368$). chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Dave, you said you were downloading data in Storage, but that task is in Communications – are you sure you remember your movements correctly?
Discussion (2/5): round: 39 (23.556711$). chat: Discussion: [Alice]: It's clear Erin, Dave, and Charlie are giving conflicting and inconsistent information, making them highly suspicious.
